pageTitle: Abacavir/Lamivudine Versus Emtricitabine/Tenofovir Both In Combination With Lopinavir/Ritonavir For The Treatment Of HIV - Study Results - ClinicalTrials.gov
textBeforeTable: Reporting Groups After screening, participants who had never received treatment for HIV-1 infection and had a viral load greater than or equal to 1,000 copies per milliliter of blood and any amount of CD4+ T-cells were equally randomized to 1 of 2 treatment groups. Significant events and approaches for the overall study following participant enrollment, but prior to group assignment Pre-Assignment Details Participants were recruited at 76 study sites in the US and 2 study sites in Puerto Rico between 26 July 2005 and 16 June 2006.
